Install solar panels: Solar panels can be installed on the roof or walls of a building to generate electricity. This electricity can then be used to power an air conditioning or heating system.
Use natural ventilation: Open windows and doors to allow fresh air to circulate and keep the temperature inside the building at a comfortable level.
Use fans: Fans can be used to circulate air and help regulate the temperature inside a building.
Install underfloor heating: Underfloor heating systems can be installed to provide a steady source of heat, which can help regulate the temperature inside a building.

Use space heaters: Space heaters can be used to heat up specific areas of a building, such as rooms or individual spaces. This can help regulate the temperature inside the building and make it more comfortable.
